sources.title: GLM-TTS | Free AI Voice Cloning & Text-to-Speech | Zero-Shot Voice ...
sources.snippet: GLM-TTS is an industrial-grade open-source text-to-speech system from Zhipu AI. Clone any voice in 3 seconds with zero-shot learning, emotional expression control, streaming inference, and phoneme-level pronunciation. Free online demo, API docs, and local deployment guides.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Celebrity voices: Not actual licensed celebrity voices for commercial use ‚Äî but very human-sounding voices that are often used instead. Integration: REST API with SDKs, easy to embed on servers for IoT to call and stream audio. Use case: Smart speakers, voice assistants, notification systems where quality matters. Pros: Realistic, scalable, API. Cons: Free tier limited; celebrity imitation usually not legally cleared. üïπ 2) Open Source / Self-Hosted (Best for Offline / IoT) GLM-TTS (Open Source Voice Cloning) Feature: Zero-shot voice cloning (train on a short sample).
